answers.answer: What kind of side effects? I am in need of some medication for this. I have sooo much pain in left ovary. I posted on may 11th Heather138, i have pcos, if you want to read my hist. it is above. Thanks

question: I have had PCOS all my life im now 45 I ignored it, well my doctors were ignorant to it and now I have Diabetes 2 and find it hard to control my blood sugar so before you all take metformin try low carbs high protein it works and the metformin has nasty side effects
